content.rendered: Vira Fruits certificates have been obtained in all fields of import exports, demonstrating our commitment to the business. To guarantee the quality of our products, we have received certificates such as ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 22000, HACCP, and OHSAS 18001. As a result of these certifications, we are able to offer fresh fruits and vegetables of high quality to customers in the Middle East and all over the world. We strive day by day to keep your satisfaction as high as possible.
